text: Más y Menos are a pair of Spanish-speaking twins from Guatemala with the ability to gain super-speed when they are physically touching. They appear in American comic books published by DC Comics and were created by Sam Register, Glen Murakami, David Slack and Alex Soto, first appearing in the Teen Titans episode Titans East (2005). Their first DC Comics appearance was in Geoff Johns' Teen Titans (Volume 3) #38 (2006). These powers are used to fight crime as teenage vigilantes. Their names are translated as "plus and minus" which is a mathematical reference. They have been involved with the Teen Titans and Titans East. Category:DC Comics characters
title: Más y Menos
